message.content: {"id": "4329", "title": "No search results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)", "description": "When searching via the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are returned. The search dialog is initialized with the fully qualified name, which is not found when searching for declarations. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. The expected behavior is that the search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.", "OB": "The search dialog in the Package view should use the element name instead of the fully qualified name when searching for declarations.", "EB": "The search dialog in the Package view incorrectly uses the fully qualified name when searching for declarations.", "SR": "Update the search dialog in the Package view to use the element name instead of the fully qualified name when searching for declarations."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4329', 'title': 'Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)', 'description': 'Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X) ', 'OB': 'The package view initializes the Search dialog with thefully qualified name. This is not found when searchingfor declarations.Search via context menu in packages view works.== (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element and ifthat fails, display the the element name and not the fully qualifiedname.NOTES: ', 'EB': 'This is not found when searchingfor declarations.Search via context menu in packages view works.== (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element and ifthat fails, display the the element name and not the fully qualifiedname.NOTES: ', 'SR': ''}
